name: Walking
details: Walking is a great way to improve or maintain your overall health.

name: Running
details: Consistent running can lower blood pressure and improve blood sugar.

name: Cycling
details: Regular or daily cycling has been found to prevent weight gain.

name: Planks
details: Planks are perfect for burning belly fat.

name: Side Planks
details: Side planks work the deep spinal stabilizing muscle quadratus lumborum.

name: Pushups
details: The push-up helps to build muscle and improve strength.

name: Sit Ups
details: When you do sit-ups every day, your back and hip muscles become more flexible.

name: Swimming
details: Swimming three times per week can boost your energy levels through increased metabolic rate.

name: Yoga
details: Yoga has been found to improve quality of life and reduce stress.
